name: Super Maria Dash
description:
Super Maria Dash is a minimalist endless runner that offers relaxing but progressively harder gameplay. It's all about beating your highscore.

If enough interest is gained, end-game incentives will be added such as unlocking new characters, backgrounds, monsters.

It is originally meant as a pick-up and play game with zero-hassle for Android and iOS.

Credit for the majority of the art goes to https://sparklinlabs.itch.io/superpowers
